entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Local smoke. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Local smoke. High 18. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
